title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.8 - Parking of vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.8 - Parking of vehicles

State Regulations

Unless otherwise permitted by the Department of

Transportation by the posting of signs or otherwise, the parking of a vehicle
for longer than two consecutive hours at facilities authorized by this Part
shall be prohibited. Vehicles parked in violation of this section may be
removed at the owner's expense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
